text: Morgan Porterfield Freeman Jr. (born June 1, 1937) is an Afro-American actor, director, producer and narrator. He is also a beekeeper. ==Early life== Freeman was born in Memphis, Tennessee on June 1, 1937.Morgan Freeman Biography (1937-) He started acting when he was nine years old in a school play and at age 12 won a drama competition in his home State. Morgan worked many acting jobs until 1968 when he got his first role on Broadway in a Musical called Hello, Dolly!. He is known for his soft-spoken voice. He has donated several amounts of money to the Democratic Party. Once he stated that "Republicans scare me." ==Some movies== Some movies that Freeman has been in include: *Brubaker as Walter (1980) *Unforgiven as Ned Logan (1992) *The Shawshank Redemption as Red (1994) *Outbreak as Gen. Billy Ford (1995) *Se7en as Detective Lt.
